details: Clean 3rd floor only, deep clean 7th table (had been spilled with lead)
Buy dishwashing soap and antibacterial spray 5pcs each
Purchase vegetables, fruits, and dairy products from the supermarket.
Identify and resolve the issue causing the login page to crash intermittently.
Schedule a meeting with the team to discuss project updates and upcoming deadlines.
Create a PowerPoint presentation for the upcoming client meeting. Include key metrics and project milestones.
Review the recent code commits and provide feedback on code quality and performance improvements.
Compile data from various departments and prepare the monthly report for management review.
Arrange venue, catering, and transportation for the company's annual conference.
Revise and update the user manual to reflect recent software updates and new features.
Conduct market research to identify emerging trends and opportunities in the industry.
Run compatibility tests to ensure the software works seamlessly across different operating systems and devices.
